Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.25172690]Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=16 µg/ml); Bacillus subtilis ATCC 9372(MIC=16 µg/ml); Streptococcus pneumoniae ATCC 49619(MIC=64 µg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=32 µg/ml); Shigella dysenteriae ATCC 51302(MIC=256 µg/ml); Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853 (MIC=64 µg/ml); Salmonella typhimurium ATCC 50013(MIC=32 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.25172690]non-toxic to mouse erythrocytes up to 512 µg/ml.
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: The change in cell surface hydrophobicity and membrane-permeable action of the purified ACWWP1 may have contributed to the antibacterial effect.

Literature.Title: Targeted separation of antibacterial peptide from protein hydrolysate of anchovy cooking wastewater by equilibrium dialysis.
Literature.Author: Tang W, Zhang H, Wang L, Qian H, Qi X.
